page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: Havant has a mixture of council and private houses.Leigh Road in Havant,has enormous detached houses which are quite old.Almost all the houses in Havant have central heating hot and cold running water. SunnyHeath Drive is in Stockheath Common.The houses are big most of them have double glazing.Inside the houses are roomy and big.Their houses are tiled ,bricked and wooden.South Street is near Bosmere.There are mainly detached houses,quite big but with small gardens.Near Bosmere school is a three storey high Georgian house. Juniper Square is also near Bosmere.Around this area there are dull terraced houses with small grass banks where children can play.Each of the areas we went to,people had different views on places where they lived.
